---
layout: default
title: Welcome to the Good Rat and Raven!!!
slug: index
---
<p class="lead">Sounds like a dive bar in the bad part of town, but it's actually a good way to communicate my talents. I'm a good rat and raven.</p>

<img src ="dist/images/raven-400.png" alt="the very smart raven" />
<p class="lead">

</p>



layout: default
title: Say `Fly` to the Raven
slug: raven
---
  <p class="lead">The Raven figures things out the first time. It's extremely independent minded and very good at solving puzzles.</p>
  <img src ="dist/images/raven-400.png" alt="the very smart raven" />
  <p class="lead"><a href="#" class="btn btn-lg btn-primary">Learn more</a></p>



---
layout: default
title: Say Hello to the Good Rat
slug: rat
---
  <p class="lead">When the Raven can't figure it out the first time, the good rat leaps over the walls to find the cheese.</p>
  <img src="dist/images/good-rat.png" alt="the good rat" />
  <p class="lead"><a href="#" class="btn btn-lg btn-primary">Learn more</a></p>



---

title: About the Good Rat and Raven

  <p class="lead">The Good Rat and the Raven are the same person: Peter Bockenthien.</p>
